basic_info.description: Iâ€™m a software engineer based in the Washington Metropolitan area.  For years, I worked in the film industry, where I had the opportunity to hone my storytelling skills and work with talented individuals. However, I always had a passion for technology and creating, which led me to explore new opportunities. After much consideration, I made the leap to the tech industry, and it has been a transformative experience. I am a creative problem-solver who enjoys taking on challenges and finding innovative solutions. I am also adaptable and able to thrive in fast-paced, ever-changing environments. Finally, I am committed to continuous learning and growth, and I am always looking for new ways to improve my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: Welcome to our task management app! With our app, you can easily organize and track all of your tasks in one place. Whether you're managing your personal to-do list or collaborating with a team, our app has all the features you need to stay on top of your tasks and meet your deadlines. We're committed to providing a user-friendly and efficient experience, so you can focus on getting things done.

projects.title: Travel Makers
projects.description: Unravel your travel! Our app is designed to help users plan and organize their travel plans all in one place. With a user-friendly interface, users can easily create their own custom itnerary with flights, hotels, and activities.

projects.title: Project Cyber
projects.description: This automobile dealership application manages sales, services, and inventory. It allows users to create, view, and delete services based on the automobile input into the system.
